Are you a fan of homemade jerky, dried fruits, and artisanal herbs? Look no further! - **50 Delicious Recipes to Get Started:** Whether you're a beginner or a pro, you'll love the 50 included recipes that will inspire you to explore all the possibilities of your new dehydrator.

- **Perfect for American Kitchens:** Designed for 120V and compatible with USA and Canada voltage standards, this dehydrator fits right into your home.
